Pre-Game Insights: Josh Hart has been on a rebounding tear recently, securing 11+ boards in each of his last four games and 8+ in six of his last eight outings.
Utah's Vulnerability to SG Rebounds: The Jazz allow the 13th most rebounds per game to opposing shooting guards.
Potential Absence of John Collins: Collins is listed as doubtful, which could weaken Utah's frontcourt presence and create more opportunities for Knicks players to dominate the glass.
Pace Consideration: Utah ranks 12th in pace, creating a faster tempo than the Knicks typically play (25th in pace). This pace-up environment could result in more rebounding chances overall.
Miscellaneous Highlights: John Collins is listed as doubtful.
Jordan Clarkson, Johnny Juzang, Keyonte George, Taylor Hendricks, and Brice Sensabaugh are all out due to injury or conditioning.
The Knicks are 1-4 in their last 5 games.
The Knicks are 1-4 in their last 5 games against the spread.
The totals have gone OVER in 2 of Knicks' last 5 games.
The totals have gone OVER in 9 of Knicks' 18 last games at home.
Others: Josh Hart is a consistent threat to crash the boards.
Karl-Anthony Towns averages 31 PPG and 21 RPG.
